author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...NOAA AND AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT REPORT THAT MELISSA IS NOW A MAJOR HURRICANE... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO EARLY NEXT WEEK...
summary: ...NOAA AND AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT REPORT THAT MELISSA IS NOW A MAJOR HURRICANE... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO EARLY NEXT WEEK... As of 11:00 PM EDT Sat Oct 25 the center of Melissa was located near 16.4, -75.9 with movement W at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 967 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...NOAA AND AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT REPORT THAT MELISSA IS NOW A MAJOR HURRICANE... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES EXPECTED IN PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO EARLY NEXT WEEK... As of 11:00 PM EDT Sat Oct 25 the center of Melissa was located near 16.4, -75.9 with movement W at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 967 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
